text: Kensington Palace just released Prince Louis's christening portraits, which were taken at Clarence House shortly after the religious ceremony. While the photos of the whole family included a few new members, namely Meghan Markle and Pippa Middleton's husband James Matthews, they were also missing Gan - Gan, Prince Louis's great - grandmother the Queen. Matt Holyoak / Camera Press / Redux Camerapress _ 03616268 _ web. jpg Both the Queen and Prince Philip missed Louis's baptism on Monday, and therefore weren't there for the official portraits marking the occasion.
